analyzed: @282b * // nyi zla 'dzin pa'i rtsis bzhugs//
translated: The calculation of the eclipse of the sun and moon is set forth.

original: # // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Kālacakra.

original: nyi zla 'dzin pa'i man ngag ni //
analyzed: nyi zla 'dzin pa'i man ngag ni //
translated: The esoteric instruction on the eclipse of the sun and moon is as follows.

original: zla ba dag par klu zla sbyin //
analyzed: zla ba dag par klu zla sbyin //
translated: Give the nāga month to the pure month.

original: de la mig gis bsgyur bar bya //
analyzed: de la mig gis bsgyur bar bya //
translated: Change the eyes on that.

original: zla ba'i don du gcig sbyin te //
analyzed: zla ba'i don du gcig sbyin te //
translated: Give one for the sake of the moon.

original: nyi ma la ni gnyis sbyin no //
analyzed: nyi ma la ni gnyis sbyin no //
translated: Give two for the sun.

original: de la mkha' dus chus thob dor //
analyzed: de la mkha' dus chus thob dor //
translated: On that, discard the space, time, and water.

original: dor rgyu med na de nyid dam //
analyzed: dor rgyu med na de nyid dam //
translated: If there is nothing to discard, it is that itself.

original: lhag ma skar mas bsgyur ba la //
analyzed: lhag ma skar mas bsgyur ba la //
translated: The remainder is changed by the stars.

original: mkha' dus chu bos bgos thob pa //
analyzed: mkha' dus chu bos bgos thob pa //
translated: The space, time, and water obtained by division

original: skar ma'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
analyzed: skar ma'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
translated: are placed in the location of the stars.

original: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la //
analyzed: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la //
translated: The remainder is multiplied by sixty.

original: gong gi 'god byed kyis thob pa //
analyzed: gong gi 'god byed kyis thob pa //
translated: The obtained by the above placement

original: chu tshod dag tu shes par bya //
analyzed: chu tshod dag tu shes par bya //
translated: is to be known as the hours.

original: chu srang dbugs dag rim pas shes //
analyzed: chu srang dbugs dag rim pas shes //
translated: The water-measure and breath are known in order.

analyzed: de ltar thob pa de rnams kyis // rgyu skar rnams la sbyangs ba'i lhag / sgra gcan gdong gi skar ma yin //
translated: The obtained by those is the remainder🔽of the purification of the stars.🔽That and the star of the sun and moon

original: de dang nyi zla'i skar ma gnyis //
analyzed: de dang nyi zla'i skar ma gnyis //
translated: are the stars of Rāhu's face.

original: mnyam na sgra gcan gdong gis 'dzin //
analyzed: mnyam na sgra gcan gdong gis 'dzin //
translated: If equal, Rāhu will hold the face.

original: mi mnyam na ni rgyu skar phyed //
analyzed: mi mnyam na ni rgyu skar phyed //
translated: If unequal, half the lunar mansion.

original: bsres pas sgra gcan mjug skar yin //
analyzed: bsres pas sgra gcan mjug skar yin //
translated: By mixing, Rāhu will hold the end of the lunar mansion.

original: de dang nyi zla'i skar ma gnyis //
analyzed: de dang nyi zla'i skar ma gnyis //
translated: That and the two lunar mansions of the sun and moon

original: mnyam na sgra gcan mjug mas 'dzin //
analyzed: mnyam na sgra gcan mjug mas 'dzin //
translated: if equal, Rāhu will hold the end.

original: de yang zla ba 'dzin pa ni //
analyzed: de yang zla ba 'dzin pa ni //
translated: Moreover, the lunar eclipse🔽is the pure half of Rāhu, and the solar eclipse is the pure half.

original: sgra gcan phyed ni dag pa dang // nyi ma dag pa gnyis bsres pas //
analyzed: sgra gcan phyed ni dag pa dang // nyi ma dag pa gnyis bsres pas //
translated: By mixing the two,

analyzed: rgyu skar rdzogs sam phyed lhag dor // thig le sha rna zla ba ni //
translated: the lunar mansion is discarded, complete or half.

original: 'dzin par the tshom med pa yin //
analyzed: 'dzin par the tshom med pa yin //
translated: There is no doubt that the lunar mansion of the tip of Śravaṇa🔽will be held.

original: mnyam po gsum dang thig le shar //
analyzed: mnyam po gsum dang thig le shar //
translated: If the three are equal and the tip arises,

original: nyi ma nges par 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: nyi ma nges par 'dzin pa yin //
translated: the sun will definitely be held.

original: dus tshod ji tsam dag na 'dzin //
analyzed: dus tshod ji tsam dag na 'dzin //

analyzed: nyin mtshan ring thung shes bya ste // gza' yi chu tshod dag dang sbyar //

analyzed: phyogs ni skar ma'i phyogs dang sbyor //

analyzed: che chung ji tsam 'dzin ba ni //

analyzed: bsres te skar mar bcas pa dang // sgra gcan skar mar bcas ba rnams //
translated: [The moon] is mixed with the stars, and Rāhu with the stars.

analyzed: mnyam na zla ba ril po 'dzin //

original: bco lngas gang rung mang gyur na //
analyzed: bco lngas gang rung mang gyur na //
translated: If any of the fifteen [stars] is greater,

original: sum cus gang mang phyed 'dzin no //
